documentation.author: ne82216
documentation.purpose: Rule evaluates admission encounter type+medical service+health plan and starts a timer rule (BCC_EOC_TIMER_STOP) which will create a clinical event result for EOC Admission Date/Time after the determined time is complete.
documentation.explanation: Our Behavioral Health facilities (BCBH and CBH) receive state funding to provide care to patients in our service areas. In order to justify this, as well as continued funding, we report Outcomes and Invoices to the Managing Entities for the State of FL. These Managing Entities are CFBHN and Lutheran (LFS). Part of the reporting related to this funding requires that a patient have an open “Episode of Care” (EOC) to coincide with the treatment being provided. This Episode of Care starts with the date of the first service being provided, and ends when the patient has completed the treatment and is discharged from that treatment series (or program).

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_ACTION_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient is ACTION and the SPECIFIC ACTION_DETAIL QUALIFIER DETAIL_VALUE

statements.statement:
select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "*ANY ACTION" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Admitted" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Person Combined" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Person Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Discharged" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Transfered" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Any patient event" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Current admit date defined, previous admit date is not defined" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Current and previous encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Current and previous person id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Current and previous person & encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Current discharged date is defined but previous discharge date is not" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Current and previous location codes differ" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 7)
order by action

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "current" elseif (d.seq = 2) "previous" elseif (d.seq = 3) "current or previous" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Current or new admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Previous admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Check before and after values" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 3)
order by d.seq

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "is" elseif (d.seq = 2) "is not" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1)
from (dummyt d with seq = 2)
order by d.seq

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_TIMER_SET_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Set timer TIMER_NAME with description DESCRIPTION to expire TIME_INTERVAL TIME_UNIT DIRECTION ANCHOR_DT_TM. LINK

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only

value.value: select from person p,person_plan_reltn ppr,health_plan hp plan p where p.person_id = trigger_personid join ppr where ppr.person_id = p.person_id join hp where hp.health_plan_id = ppr.health_plan_id and hp.plan_name_key in ('BHMCDPSYCHCARE','CATPASCO','CFBHN','LSFRFP','BCBHLSF','BNETCFBHN','FACTCFBHN','FORENSICCFBHN','FORENSICLSF','MATCFBHN','PASCOFIT','UFC','PDCFBHN','PATHCFBHN','TANFCFBHN','VCFN') and hp.active_ind = 1 head report log_misc1 = "No plan found" detail log_misc1 = hp.plan_name_key with nocounter, nullreport go
